srm_utils

Utilities used my core classes.

Static methods for easy bit manipulations.

Summary
srm_utils
Utilities used my core classes.
Class Declaration
class srm_utils
Methods
extract_fieldExtracts the field bytes from the register bytes starting at lsb with given bits.
merge_fieldCopy the field bytes into the correct position in the output register bytes.
extract_field_enablesGet the byte enables for the bytes in the field.
set_field_enablesSet the byte enables for the bytes in the field.
bytes_2_hexConvert a list of bytes into a hex string.

Methods

extract_field

static function srm_data_t extract_field( const ref  srm_data_t  bytes,
input  int  lsb_pos,
input  int  n_bits )

Extracts the field bytes from the register bytes starting at lsb with given bits.

merge_field

static function void merge_field( ref  srm_data_t  reg_bytes,
const ref  srm_data_t  field_bytes,
input  int  lsb_pos,
input  int  n_bits )

Copy the field bytes into the correct position in the output register bytes.  The field can start at any bit position in the output register bytes and can end of any bit position.  Care is taken so that only field bits are affected in the output register.

extract_field_enables

static function srm_byte_enable_t extract_field_enables(
    const ref  srm_byte_enable_t  byte_enables,
    input  int  lsb_pos,
    input  int  n_bits
)

Get the byte enables for the bytes in the field.

set_field_enables

static function void set_field_enables( ref  srm_byte_enable_t  byte_enables,
input  int  lsb_pos,
input  int  n_bits )

Set the byte enables for the bytes in the field.

bytes_2_hex

static function string bytes_2_hex( const ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Convert a list of bytes into a hex string.  A debug function.
